00039 #include <QLineEdit>
00040 #include <QModelIndex>
00041 #include <QObject>

00043 #include <Inventor/SbName.h> 
00044 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>

00052 NodeNameDelegate::NodeNameDelegate( SceneModel* sceneModel,  QObject* parent)
00053  : QItemDelegate(parent), m_pModel( sceneModel )
00054 {
00055         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::NodeNameDelegate", false );
00056 } 
00057 
00058 NodeNameDelegate::~NodeNameDelegate()
00059 {
00060         
00061 }
00062 
00063 QWidget* NodeNameDelegate::createEditor(QWidget* parent, const QStyleOptionViewItem& /*option*/, const QModelIndex& /*index*/) const
00064 {
00065         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::createEditor", false );
00066         QLineEdit  *editor = new QLineEdit (parent);
00067         connect ( editor, SIGNAL (editingFinished()), this, SLOT (commitChangesAndClose()) );
00068         return editor;
00069 
00070 }
00071 
00072 void NodeNameDelegate::setEditorData(QWidget *editor,
00073                                      const QModelIndex &index) const
00074 {
00075         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::setEditorData", false );
00076         QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00077 
00078         QLineEdit  *textEdit = static_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00079         
00080         SoNode* coinNode = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index )->GetNode();
00081         
00082         QString nodeName;
00083         if ( coinNode->getName() == SbName() )
00084                 nodeName = QString( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00085         else
00086                 nodeName = QString( coinNode->getName().getString() );
00087                 
00088         textEdit->setText( nodeName );
00089 
00090 } 
00091 
00092 void NodeNameDelegate::setModelData(QWidget* editor, QAbstractItemModel* /*model*/, const QModelIndex& index ) const
00093 {
00094         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::setModelData", false );
00095         QLineEdit  *textEdit = static_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00096         
00097         SoNode* coinNode =m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index )->GetNode();
00098         
00099         SbName* coinName = new SbName( textEdit->text().toStdString().c_str() );
00100         coinNode->setName( *coinName );
00101 
00102 } 
00103 
00104 void NodeNameDelegate::commitChangesAndClose()
00105 {
00106         QLineEdit *editor = qobject_cast< QLineEdit* >(sender());
00107         emit commitData(editor);
00108         emit closeEditor(editor);
00109 }
